Traveling to Korea, you must go to the sweat room to experience a Korean sweat steaming. Koreans like to sweat steaming. For them, the meaning of coming here to rest is greater than health. Many families like to drag their families to the sweat steaming room in groups. Everyone lies in it and rests comfortably. Eat the snacks of the steaming room together, this is a traditional folk culture in South Korea, it is worth experiencing once. There are many kinds of sweat steaming rooms, and the price is also quite different. This time I chose the oldest classic sweat steaming room in Itaiyuan. We arrived at the time after dinner in the evening, about 8 o'clock to arrive at the sweat steaming room. At this time, there are very few people, plus we do not exceed 10 people. Go in at the door and collect towels and clothes at the front desk. Put your bags and everything in the cabinet. You can still carry your valuables with you. Then go up. There is a shower room that can be cleaned first. If you don’t need it, you can go directly to the steaming room. , divided into several rooms: hot steaming, ice steaming, Salt steaming, etc., local friends introduced that first go to hot steaming and sweating, then go to ice steaming to soothe the heat, and then go to salt steaming to lie down and rest, it is best to go back and forth a few times, about half an hour to change is the best. The room is not big, there is no gender, it is a small door to bend in, there is no bed or the like, it is to lie on the floor or sit, how comfortable how to come. Here is a relatively simple steam room, now there are many new ones that are taller, there are independent single rooms and the like; But this is very traditional, Korean variety shows and TV dramas like to come here to shoot, there are various artists on the wall to this tour photos, the price is also very affordable, a person about 30-40 look; The location is also easy to find, and there is no problem with the navigation.
